DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate drug concentration AzaSite compare Vigamox tear healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Study AzaSite Versus Vigamox Tears Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Have visual acuity , use corrective lens ( contact lens ) necessary , eye least +0.7 assess Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study . Have normal lid anatomy . Have abnormal biomicroscopy ophthalmoscopy exam . Have diagnosis dry eye disease experience dry eye symptom ( photophobia , foreign body sensation , itching , burning , pain , dry grittiness ) past thirty day . Have use artificial tear past thirty day . Have diagnosis ongoing ocular infection lid margin inflammation . Have ever penetrate ocular surface intraocular surgery . Have know hypersensitivity azithromycin , macrolide antibiotic ingredient AzaSite . Have know hypersensitivity Vigamox fluoroquinolone antibiotic ingredient Vigamox . Have corneal lid abnormality . Have glaucoma , Intra Ocular Pressure 22 mm Hg great one eye . Have ocular pathology exception cataract . Have serious systemic disease uncontrolled medical condition . Have experience symptom viral allergic conjunctivitis past 30 day . Have history liver kidney disease result persist dysfunction .
